entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
